channel.title: Need Some Ideas!

Hi, Im currently in progress of building a new server and I need some shops I have a god shop and a PK shop... Post your ideas like this...

Thank you, also some command ideas would also be nice! :rolleyes: - Toonshorty _______________________________________________________________________ Test out the server (wont be very good) IP: 5.166.244.39 _______________________________________________________________________
